setWidthPercentage

public void setWidthPercentage(boolean widthPercentage)
Sets whether the value passed into setWidth(int) should be treated as a percentage or as a number of pixels. The default is false (pixels) to maintain backwards compatibility.

Parameters:
widthPercentage - pass true if the width is specified as a percentage, false if the width is specified in pixels
Since:
1.4

isWidthPercentage

public boolean isWidthPercentage()
Tells you whether the value returned from getWidth() is the width as a percentage or in pixels.

Returns:
true if the width should be treated as a percentage, false if the width should be treated as an amount of pixels
Since:
1.4

setHeightPercentage

public void setHeightPercentage(boolean heightPercentage)
Sets whether the value passed into setHeight(int) should be treated as a percentage or as a number of pixels. The default is false (pixels) to maintain backwards compatibility.

Parameters:
heightPercentage - pass true if the height is specified as a percentage, false if the height is specified in pixels
Since:
1.4

isHeightPercentage

public boolean isHeightPercentage()
Tells you whether the value returned from getHeight() is the height as a percentage or in pixels.

Returns:
true if the height should be treated as a percentage, false if the height should be treated as an amount of pixels
Since:
1.4
